name: Redneck Rampage Rides Again
description: includes 14 new single player levels new enemies, weapons, and vehicles, including motorcycles and swamp boats
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 406 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 420 MB available space
